name: Create a Crypto Payment Link in Telegram with OxaPay
description:
This template automatically receives input from a Telegram bot (such as an invoice amount or order details), generates a crypto payment link through OxaPay, and sends the link back to the same Telegram chat. 

With this automation, you can easily accept cryptocurrency payments from your Telegram users without leaving the chat. Perfect for small businesses, freelancers, and community managers who want to simplify their crypto transactions.

This template was created by OxaPay Company.
For setup instructions or support, please contact [oxapay.com](https://oxapay.com/).
